sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REMT3200 ( DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NM , ANTY_ACCU_ACCU_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_SUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #clutYrMnth# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #systemkey# , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1 FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ) , #antyAccuBusoprNum# , #antyAccuBusoprNm# , #antyAccuAccuNum# , #antyAccuDepitSum# , #antyAccuDepitDt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REMT3200 SET ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NUM=#antyAccuBusoprNum# , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NM=#antyAccuBusoprNm# , ANTY_ACCU_ACCU_NUM=#antyAccuAccuNum# , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_SUM=#antyAccuDepitSum# , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_DT=#antyAccuDepitDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM=#antyAccuSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM=#antyAccuSeilNum#
DELETE FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NM , ANTY_ACCU_ACCU_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_SUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM=#antyAccuSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_BUSOPR_NM , ANTY_ACCU_ACCU_NUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_SUM , ANTY_ACCU_DEPIT_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , CLUT_YR_MNTH DESC , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , ANTY_ACCU_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM REMT3200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
